1927

July

Lummi, Orcas Islands Connected by Ferry: Bellingham, Wednesday July 6â€”Ferry service between Lummi and Orcas Islands was established Sunday by Corcoran & Tuttle when they placed the City of Clinton in operation. It carried a dozen or more cars. The ferry will operate daily during the summer, connecting with the ferry Central operated by Whatcom County between Goosberry Point, Lummi Reservation and Beach, Lummi Island. Cars will motor between Beach and Legoe Bay, the Lummi Island terminus. The Orcas Island pier is at Culver's Landing. (Seattle Daily Times)
